title: Tech Talk Episodes 11 & 12.
creator_credit: Allenog Pty Ltd, SBS-TV and John Kyle
brief_description: A compilation tape containing eight programmes designed to help young people in their career choices. Details of what various jobs entail, the neccessary qualifications and how to go about getting the job are provided. There is also a segment on survival skills. The topics covered are as follows- apprenticeships, photography, carpet laying, gardening, locksmith, travel agent, lift mechanic, despair and how to handle it. Presented by Michael Shildberger.
